info_messages.message: Information about and download of this MPAseco on MPAseco.org
Use "/list" -> "/jukebox ##" to add a map in the jukebox.
Please don\'t sound your horn throughout the entire map.
When going AFK, please set your character to Spectator mode.
Don\'t use Enter to skip intros - instead use Space & Enter
For player & server info use the "/stats" and "/server" commands.
Looking for the name of this server? Use the "/server" command.
Wondering which maps you haven\'t played recently? Use "/list norecent" to find out!
Who is the most victorious player? Use "/topwins" to find out!
Wondering what maps were played recently? Use the "/history" command.
Jukeboxed the wrong map? Use "/jukebox drop" to remove it!
Forgot what someone said? Use "/chatlog" to check the chat history!
Forgot what someone pm-ed you? Use "/pmlog" to check your PM history!
Looking for the next better ranked player to beat? Use "/nextrank"!
Use "/list newest" to find the newest maps added to the server, then /jukebox them!
Use "/mute" and "/unmute" to mute / unmute other players, and "/mutelist" to list them!
Wondering when a player was last online? Use "/laston LOGIN" to find out!
Find the MX info for a map with the "/mxinfo" command!
Use the "/style" command to select your personal window style!
Use the "/votepanel" command to select your personal vote panel!
Check out the new MPAseco site at MPAseco.org !

featured_vote_messages.message: Find out all about the chat-based voting commands with "/helpvote"!

jfreu_messages.send_window_message: Check out the new MPAseco site at ' . MPASECO . ' !
